numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph shows how different generations view the future of the world.
2. The graph shows how different age groups view the future of the world.
3. The younger generation has ages from 15 to 24.
4. The younger generation is more optimistic about the future of the world.
5. The younger generation believes that the world gets better with each generation.
6. In Indonesia, young adults are optimistic about the future of the world.
7. In Indonesia, older adults are optimistic about the future of the world.
8. I wonder what caused older generations to lose faith in the future of the world.
9. I wonder whether younger adults are biased.
10. Younger adults are considered to be the future of the world.
12. I am in the younger generation.
13. I think that the future of the world will be bright.
14. The name of the graph is "Age VS Optimism".
